languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, осмотр систем корабля завершен, {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} докладывают, что {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} удовлетворены и спокойны. Все готово к продолжению путешествий... однако есть проблема, которую мы должны довести до вашего сведения".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, ремонт корабля завершен, {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} докладывают, что {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} удовлетворены и спокойны. Все готово к продолжению путешествий... однако есть проблема, которую мы должны довести до вашего сведения".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, осмотр систем корабля завершен, {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} докладывают, что {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} удовлетворены и спокойны. Все готово к продолжению путешествий... однако есть проблема, которую мы должны довести до вашего сведения".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the vessel repairs are complete. The tech-priests are reporting the machine spirits are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for the upcoming journeys... Except there is a issue you must be made aware of."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, la inspección de los sistemas de la nave está lista. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} informan de que los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} están tranquilos y satisfechos. Podemos continuar nuestro viaje... pero hay algo que debe saber».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: «L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, las reparaciones han terminado. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} informan de que los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} están tranquilos y satisfechos. Podemos continuar nuestro viaje... pero hay algo que debe saber».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，舰船系统的检查工作已经完成。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}报告说{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}已经恢复了平静，目前处于心满意足的状态。一切都已准备就绪，我们可以继续前进了……不过，有个问题我需要向您报告。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，舰船的维修已经完成。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}报告说{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}已经恢复了平静，目前处于心满意足的状态。一切都已准备就绪，我们可以继续前进了……不过，有个问题我需要向您报告。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船のシステムの点検が完了しました。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}から、{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は落ち着いていて満足した状態だと報告がありました。先へ進む準備は全て整っています…ただし、ご注意いただきたいことがひとつ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の修理が完了しました。{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}から、{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は落ち着いていて満足した状態だと報告がありました。先へ進む準備は全て整っています…ただし、ご注意いただきたいことがひとつ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Inspektion der Systeme des Schiffs ist abgeschlossen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} melden, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} ruhig und zufrieden sind. Alles ist zur Weiterreise bereit ... Nur auf eine Sache muss ich Euch noch hinweisen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Schiffsreparaturen sind abgeschlossen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} melden, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} ruhig und zufrieden sind. Alles ist zur Weiterreise bereit ... Nur auf eine Sache muss ich Euch noch hinweisen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'inspection des systèmes du vaisseau est terminée et les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} rapportent que les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits des machines{/g} ont retrouvé leur calme. Nous allons pouvoir reprendre notre route... mais d'abord, je dois vous signaler un problème. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, les réparations du vaisseau sont terminées, et les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} rapportent que les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits des machines{/g} ont retrouvé leur calme. Nous allons pouvoir reprendre notre route... mais d'abord, je dois vous signaler un problème. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, geminin sistemlerinin muayenesi tamamlandı. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarının{/g} sakin ve hoşnut olduğu raporunu verdi. Yola devam etmek için her şey hazır... Bilgilendirilmeniz gereken bir husus hariç."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the inspection of the ship's systems is complete. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} are reporting the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are calm and satisfied. Everything is ready for onward travel... Except there is an issue you must be made aware of."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, geminin sistemlerinin incelemesi tamamlandı. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}nın sakin ve hoşnut olduğu raporunu verdi. Yola devam etmek için her şey hazır. Bilgilendirilmeniz gereken tek bir husus haricinde."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
